about: Fourth-year IT student specializing in JavaScript development with hands-on experience in fullstack web technologies. Passionate about creating scalable web applications and eager to contribute as a team player in a dynamic development environment. Dedicated to continuous learning and professional growth with a clear goal of advancing to a Junior Developer role within the next two years.

university.name: Da Nang University of Science and Technology

services.name: API Development
services.description: Develop and maintain robust APIs for web and mobile platforms, ensuring seamless integration through clear and comprehensive API documentation.

services.name: Web UI Development
services.description: Build responsive and user-friendly web interfaces based on design specifications, with seamless API integration.

services.name: Web Development
services.description: Deliver end-to-end web solutions by developing both frontend and backend components, including APIs and user interfaces.

services.name: IoT Server Development
services.description: Develop and maintain the server-side infrastructure for IoT solutions, focusing on device communication, data processing, and integration with cloud platforms for real-time monitoring and control.
